properties.entry: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT C.COUPON_NO, C.COUPON_NAME, C.COUPON_RATIO, C.COUPON_STARTDATE, C.COUPON_ENDDATE, NVL(MC.ISSUE_COUPON_CNT, 0) AS ISSUE_COUPON_CNT, NVL(TMC.USES_COUPON_CNT, 0) AS USES_COUPON_CNT, C.COUPON_AVAIL, NVL(C.COUPON_REASON, '-') AS COUPON_REASON FROM (SELECT COUPON_NO, COUNT(*) AS ISSUE_COUPON_CNT FROM TB_MEMBER_COUPON GROUP BY COUPON_NO) MC, (SELECT COUPON_NO, COUNT(COUPON_NO) AS USES_COUPON_CNT FROM TB_MEMBER_COUPON WHERE MEMBER_COUPON_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY COUPON_NO) TMC, TB_COUPON C WHERE MC.COUPON_NO(+) = C.COUPON_NO AND MC.COUPON_NO = TMC.COUPON_NO(+) ORDER BY C.COUPON_NO ASC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
